Mimi was a girl from season one who moved to America later on. She occasionally returns to help out. She now wears white shorts and her hair has been dyed pink. Best of all, she wears a blue t-shirt that stops short, revealing her belly button.

You begin tickling her in the forest where nobody else is around. You grab her belly and begin tickling it quickly and heavily. She laughs her head off as you smile brightly. Her hair waives in the air and you show no signs of stopping the tickling.

"OHOHOH NO PLEASE NOO!" The beautiful pinkette shouts as you keep tickling. Her shirt rides up a little more and you can see that her midriff is very well-toned and smooth. You continue the tickling for a while longer before you decide to give her a break since it looks like she'll die!

"Thanks, cutie." She tells you. You blush at the comment. "Awww, you're blushing!" She laughs as she closes up to you and lies down on her back, looking up at you. "So...."

You lie down, with your head on her belly. She allows is and giggles a little. She takes her hand and strokes your head with it. SHe doesn't seem to mind that your hair is on her belly. As she breathes, her belly gets bigger and smaller which causes your head to go up and down. Her belly is pretty cold but you don't care, you're lucky to be keeping your head on it.

131.content: You were sitting by a lake in the park. It was late and all you were doing was chucking stones into the water. "Man. Just boring old life as usual." You said to yourself. "Ever since that giant blob, whatever they called it, was destroyed, there hasn't been much excitement." Suddenly, you feel something furry lightly tickle your side. You yelp and jump up being super ticklish. When you look back around to see what's going on, you see a squrel rummaging through your back pocket while its tail involuntarily flickers around. It pulls out the last little remains of a candy bar you were eating. "Hey get outta there!" You yell at it as it pulls out that last bit and starts running. "Hey you bushy tailed rat that's my last peice of candy! Come back!" You yell out to it. Just when you decide to go after it, you see the squrel dart up a tree and escape your sight. "Darn it." You say sitting back down. Just then you hear light, girlish giggles come from behind you. You turn and see a girl looking around your age leaning against a tree with purple eyes, red hair that seems to be tied back, a blue and white tee shirt with a dark blue heart in the center, red sneakers, and bage shorts. "So you don't like squrels?" She asked walking over to you to you. "Only when there stealing my food." You say back to her. She comes and sits next to you and says "Oh really. And what was with that yelp before?" "Oh um nothing. It just tickled me is all." You answered her. "So your ticklish then?" She said with a sly smile. Uh oh. I think you all know where this is gonna lead to. "Uh um well I...yeah. I am." I say stammering and blushing with a hint of embarrassment. Then you feel something prod your side (her finger) and you yelp a bit loader than before. You turn to Rika and you see her snickering. "Ask me, I'd say ticklish is putting it lightly."
131.title: Rika:The Digimon Queen

141.content:
as you look out to the sea, you think of the different digimon out there. you smile as the thought of adventure slides into your head. but that soon subsides when you feel something slippery slide under your foot. you squeak for a moment and burst into giggles, jerking your foot away from the sand revealing a small starfish which you pick up.
"It's amazing how something so small can do so much damage" you say, smiling at the creature before setting it down into the ocean as the water and sand slides between your toes. as you stand in the surf, smiling as the sand tickles the soles of your feet, someone slides a finger across your side. you snap into giggles as you jump out of the water and away from the finger. looking around, you find yourself looking at a blonde haired girl mostly in purple clothing.
"I didn't know you were that ticklish" she said playfully. you seem confused at this remark. "I saw the thing that happened with the starfish" she said, clearing things up for you.
"oh" you say, going pink with embarassment, "you saw that"
"it's ok" she says, "I'm not gonna tell anyone"
"thanks" you say, relieved.
"I can relate to it" she says, rather embarassed, "I'm Ticklish as well"
"So I could get Even with you" you say, grinning.
"I'm not saying to though" she says, smiling at you.
you sit on the sand and look out to sea again. soon enough, the girl joins you.
"By the way" she says, "I'm Zoe. It's nice to meet you"
"you too" you say, still looking out to the sea.
141.title: a day at the beach

You're in clear victory in this tickle fight and you show no signs of stopping since you're both having so much fun.

"Aaaaahahahahahahahahaha!" The cute girl starts to laugh as you move back to her uncovered belly button from her back. She's now laying on the ground, completely helpless so you take advantage of the situation and keep tickling her belly. "How do you like THAT?"

"nonono nomore!" Zoe pleades. Normally you wouldn't have stopped but it seemed like she really needed the break, so you stop tickling her belly and let her sit up.

"Thanks for stopping, cutie." She says.

"Uhh..." You start to say.

"Are you alright?" Zoe asks.

"I'm fine." You reply.

"Well if you're fine....."
14133.title: You attack Zoe's belly

141331.content: Zoe then suddenly pounced on you, straddled you and began tickling your ribs. "We never did finish our tickle fight, remember?" said Zoe as she pokes and squeezes you ticklish ribs. "hahahahahahahahahahahahahaheystahahahahahaphahahahaha" you laugh. "Ok I'll stop" said Zoe before she finishes saying "tickling your ribs". and with that she began tickling your

Zoe than moved her hands under your shirt and rakes her nails over your now exposed tummy. "HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAH ANOSTAHAHAHAHAPHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA" you laugh while squirming trying to avoid her tickling hands. "HAHAHAHAHAZOEHAHAHAPLEASESTOHAHHAHAHAHA" you beg. "Give Up?" asks Zoe.

info.brief_description: tickle or be tickled by the girls from Digimon
info.description:
you're a male human in the Digital world. You're brave, smart, quick - witted, and (to your bad luck) insanely ticklish. of course this is a bit of bad luck one day. you meet one of the digimon heroines who soon finds out that you are ticklish, and you soon find out you are in for a bumpy ride.

Basically, you choose to either tickle or be tickled by the heroines from digimon.

And the usual stuff.
no nudity.
no sex stuff
no killing

so enjoy and don't be afraid to add a chapter
